about_the_game:
When you find yourself in a realm between realms, and a living room with glowing orbs, there are only so many things it could be. Unravel the mystery of a small family living in The Bronx in 1998, find clues, solve mystery's, and maybe cause a couple. Find how you, play a part in all of this.

FEATURES

  • Pick up objects using telekinesis, they will glow if you can pick them up!

  • Go and explore! You are able to explore everything in the room around you, your not confined to just your objective. Who knows some secrets could be found...

  • Level's, after each level, you will be able to go back to the previous level and explore what has changes in the rooms as you have progressed and the people living in the areas have changed the environment. 

  • Notes, certain objects can be inspected to tell you more about the world, this includes notes, and some objects!

  • Characters, there are intractable characters and cut-scenes throughout each level to help shed a light on the mystery within the game...

  • Portals, be able to go through portals at some point during each level, each portal has new gameplay, so you will never get bored!

  • Interactions, every object can be picked up and has physics, so have fun placing objects around and stacking them to solve puzzles!

Get ready for a story...

short_description: A story-rich puzzle game that has a mystery to solve, can you find out how you are a part of the mystery within this painterly world? Can you solve the mystery, can you save this family, or will you fail...
